content:
As my teachers at the Academia always say,
a true scholar must approach every conclusion
with perpetual skepticism.
info: 幻雪赶海相关闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
Yeep~ You seem to be having such a delightful time collecting seafood.
Unfortunately, I dare not join in...
You see, lobster claws are the natural nemesis of my tail.
info: 幻雪赶海相关闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
And the Faintglow on my tail seems to be particularly attractive to them...
What a troublesome relationship~ How mysterious~
info: 幻雪赶海相关闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
Indeed, the beach was submerged earlier.
However, each world bubble has its own peculiar characteristics,
So I couldn't be entirely certain of the truth before.
info: 幻雪赶海相关闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
What's wrong? Are you having trouble with tide-pooling?
Why are you staring at my tail?
N-no, that won't do...
info: 幻雪赶海相关闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
When beachcombing, don't stare into the deep sea below.
Hmm... don't ask me how I know that.
